segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a typical day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is absorbed in her dish-drying task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet is running wild, overflowing the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pours over, soaking the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron might get wet soon if she doesn't notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, the boy climbs precariously on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate while grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out unstably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready to catch her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like they're in their own little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden through the window looks inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the slip hazard on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she miss all this chaos?
segments.speaker: PAR
